Class Instruction 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Instruction
public class Instruction
extends Object
A class for keeping track of instructions.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

Instruction 
 public Instruction(int opc,

opn - the operand

Parameters:

setOPND

Parameters:
